alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Edmunds; Faulk; McPherson; Potter; Sully; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 01 at 1:48AM MDT until November 02 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND BREEZY WINDS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND BREEZY WINDS... The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a Red Flag Warning for low humidity and breezy winds, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 8 PM CDT this evening. A Red Flag Warning has also been issued from noon to 8 PM CDT Wednesday. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Corson, Campbell, McPherson, Walworth, Edmunds, Dewey, Potter, Faulk and Sully. * WINDS...South at 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph this afternoon. South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph for Wednesday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent both this afternoon and Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The combination of breezy winds, low humidity, and cured fine fuels will result in critical fire weather conditions over portions of central and south central South Dakota.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Edmunds; Faulk; McPherson; Potter; Sully; Walworth
